text: Egha Iesus ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba ko Farisiba, Iavzika, ia bar ikuvigham! Ia ifavaribagh amir gumaziba! Ia God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn tiam asarazɨ, gumazamiziba azenan iti. Egha ia uaghan aven mangan aghua. Ezɨ gumazamiziba aven mangasava amima ia men tuaviba apɨri.(23:13-14) Fofozir gumazir maba ghaze, akar kamnagh uaghan kagh ikiam. A kamakɨn, “Ia Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba ko Farisiba, Iavzika. Ia gumazir mɨzer pumuning itiba, ia amizir paba ovengezibagh ifarava men dɨpenibar okɨava, oda mɨgɨrɨgɨar bar ruariba God ko dagh ami. Kotiamɨn Dughiamɨn ia bar ikuvigham.” Nɨ Mak 12:40ɨn gan.
